contest-event.event-date:
Sept. 1, 1890 D Belle Vue September Contest
British Open 1 Test Piece Contest
british-open
Euryanthe [arr. Godfrey]
Belle Vue, Manchester, Greater Manchester, England, UK Additional source: The Leeds Mercury (Leeds, England), Tuesday, September 2, 1890; Issue 16351. Prizes: 1st: £30 2nd: £25 3rd: £20 4th: £12 5th: £8 6th: £5. Best cornet - H.Roach - Batley Old. Best euphonium - A.Sanderson - Stocksbridge. 26 bands entered, 12 competed.
April 26, 2011, 9:04 a.m. June 8, 2019, 6:48 a.m.
